import React from "react" import { Link, NavLink, useParams } from "react-router-dom" export default function HostVanDetail() { const params = useParams() const [van, setVan] = React.useState(null) React.useEffect( () => { fetch(`/api/vans/${params.id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setVan(data.vans)) },[params.id]) return ( <>

Back to all vans
